data: `minecraft:behavior.charge_attack` allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

data.Name: max_distance
data.Description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target.

data.Name: min_distance
data.Description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Modifies the entity's speed when charging toward the target.

data.Name: success_rate
data.Description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%)
